Name: Blue Margarita
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop crushed ice. Serve with straws.
Review: A 'Disco Drink'  that's just as the name suggests, a Margarita, only blue.
Nutrition: One serving of Blue Margarita contains 233 calories
